author: arminw
msg: We noticed that under heavy load (lack of memory) OJB returns closed Connections into the pool. This happens when the finalizer activates the finalize method of PersistenceBroker instances. At least MySQL Connections are already closed at this point (their finalize called as well?). Closed Connections cause a lot of trouble later on when borrowed back to use from the pool.
ConnectionFactoryPooledImpl now always check for closed connections when connection was returned to pool and validation of connection was improved.
